reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Technical Assistance Programme on Financial Services in India

description.narrative: This programme will work in partnership with the Indian central and state governments and financial regulators to support greater financial inclusion and the reach of financial services to India’s population through FinTech, including greater access to insurance and pensions products, and create sustainable and inclusive economic growth through better access to finance to invest in infrastructure. The programme will also generate opportunities for international businesses including bringing potential benefits to British business in the financial services sector, where they are well placed to compete. [Following a methodology change, from financial year 19/20 costs under this activity will be reported against a new activity line. You can find the new IATI identifier by looking up “other identifier information”.]
